Description.Name: HPCS
Description.Details: Rule the battlefield with the Doering Electronics High Precision Convergence System (HPCS), a groundbreaking creation from the renowned Doering Electronics. Imbued with cutting-edge neural processors and gyro-stabilizers, the HPCS, guided by the Neural Precision Harmonizer, translates MechWarrior movements into meticulous precision. Its dynamic Tactical Aiming Interface adjusts in real-time, ensuring each shot hits its mark with unparalleled accuracy. Overcoming environmental challenges with Adaptive Ballistic Compensation and dominating low-light conditions with its Nocturnal Targeting Enhancement mode, the HPCS stands as Doering Electronics' pinnacle of precision, transforming chaos into calculated victory on the battlefield.

Description.Name: High Precision Convergence System: Increased Called Shot Targeted Location Hit Chance - {current}
